LanguageData.Plant_Astragalus.label: astragalus
LanguageData.Plant_Astragalus.description: A small perennial wildflower that grows in alpine climates.
LanguageData.Plant_Berry.label: raspberry bush
LanguageData.Plant_Berry.description: A bushy plant which yields delicious red berries.
LanguageData.Plant_Dandelion.label: dandelions
LanguageData.Plant_Dandelion.description: A common small flower. Though it is often considered a weed, it is pleasant to look at.
LanguageData.Plant_Moss.label: moss
LanguageData.Plant_Moss.description: A wild moss that grows in clumps in areas of low light and high humidity. Very hardy and frost-resistant.
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBirch.label: birch tree
LanguageData.Plant_TreeBirch.description: A northern tree known for its thin, paper-like bark.
LanguageData.Plant_TreeOak.label: oak tree
LanguageData.Plant_TreeOak.description: A strong hardwood tree. Slow-going, but its wood is very strong.
LanguageData.Plant_TreePine.label: pine tree
LanguageData.Plant_TreePoplar.label: poplar tree
LanguageData.Plant_TreePoplar.description: A softwood tree. Grows fast, but yield little useful wood.
